A

AnalogStick - Class in com.devpaul.analogsticklib
Created by Paul Tsouchlos This is a custom analog for this application that only works in the y direction.

Constructor for an analog stick.

O

onAnalogMove(float, float) - Method in interface com.devpaul.analogsticklib.OnAnalogMoveListener
Returns the raw x and y coordinates of the center stick relative to the center of the larger circle.
onAnalogMovedGetAngle(float) - Method in interface com.devpaul.analogsticklib.OnAnalogMoveListener
Returns the current angle of the analog stick.

Returns the quadrant location of the analog stick.

onAnalogMovedScaledY(float) - Method in interface com.devpaul.analogsticklib.OnAnalogMoveListener

Q

Quadrant - Enum in com.devpaul.analogsticklib
Can have one of four values: TOP_RIGHT, TOP_LEFT, BOTTOM_LEFT, BOTTOM_RIGHT

S

setInnerX(float) - Method in class com.devpaul.analogsticklib.AnalogStick
Sets the inner X coordinate.
setInnerY(float) - Method in class com.devpaul.analogsticklib.AnalogStick
Sets the innery value for the view.
setMaxXValue(float) - Method in class com.devpaul.analogsticklib.AnalogStick
This will scale the movement of the analog stick in the x direction so that +maxXValue is returned when all the way to the right and -maxXValue all the way to the left.
setMaxYValue(float) - Method in class com.devpaul.analogsticklib.AnalogStick
This will scale all the movement of the stick so that when the stick is all the way up you get +maxYValue returned in OnAnalogStickMovedListener and -maxYValue when it's all the way down
setOnAnalogMoveListner(OnAnalogMoveListener) - Method in class com.devpaul.analogsticklib.AnalogStick
Sets a listener for this view that returns various values.

valueOf(String) - Static method in enum com.devpaul.analogsticklib.Quadrant

Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
